verses.verse: But it displeased <S%H7489><s%> <S%H413><s%> Jonah <S%H3124><s%> exceedingly, <S%H7451><s%> <S%H1419><s%> and he was very angry. <S%H2734><s%>

And he prayed <S%H6419><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I pray thee, <S%H577><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> my saying, <S%H1697><s%> when I was <S%H1961><s%> yet <S%H5704><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> my country? <S%H127><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I fled <S%H1272><s%> before <S%H6923><s%> unto Tarshish: <S%H8659><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I knew <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art a gracious <S%H2587><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> and merciful, <S%H7349><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and of great <S%H7227><s%> kindness, <S%H2617><s%> and repentest <S%H5162><s%> thee of <S%H5921><s%> the evil. <S%H7451><s%>

Therefore now, <S%H6258><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> take, <S%H3947><s%> I beseech thee, <S%H4994><s%> <S%H853><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me; for <S%H3588><s%> it is better <S%H2896><s%> for me to die <S%H4194><s%> than to live. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2416><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Doest thou well <S%H3190><s%> to be angry? <S%H2734><s%>

So Jonah <S%H3124><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> on the east side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6924><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> him a booth, <S%H5521><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> it in the shadow, <S%H6738><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> he might see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> would become <S%H1961><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> prepared <S%H4487><s%> a gourd, <S%H7021><s%> and made it to come up <S%H5927><s%> over <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Jonah, <S%H3124><s%> that it might be <S%H1961><s%> a shadow <S%H6738><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> him from his grief. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7451><s%> So Jonah <S%H3124><s%> was <S%H8055><s%> exceeding glad <S%H1419><s%> <S%H8057><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> the gourd. <S%H7021><s%>

But God <S%H430><s%> prepared <S%H4487><s%> a worm <S%H8438><s%> when the morning <S%H7837><s%> rose <S%H5927><s%> the next day, <S%H4283><s%> and it smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gourd <S%H7021><s%> that it withered. <S%H3001><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the sun <S%H8121><s%> did arise, <S%H2224><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> prepared <S%H4487><s%> a vehement <S%H2759><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> wind; <S%H7307><s%> and the sun <S%H8121><s%> beat <S%H5221><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of Jonah, <S%H3124><s%> that he fainted, <S%H5968><s%> and wished <S%H7592><s%> in <S%H854><s%> himself <S%H5315><s%> to die, <S%H4191><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> It is better <S%H2896><s%> for me to die <S%H4194><s%> than to live. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2416><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Jonah, <S%H3124><s%> Doest thou well <S%H3190><s%> to be angry <S%H2734><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the gourd? <S%H7021><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I do well <S%H3190><s%> to be angry, <S%H2734><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> death. <S%H4194><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> hast had pity <S%H2347><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the gourd, <S%H7021><s%> for the which <S%H834><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> labored, <S%H5998><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> madest it grow; <S%H1431><s%> which came up <S%H1961><s%> in <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1121><s%> a night, <S%H3915><s%> and perished <S%H6><s%> in <S%H1121><s%> a night: <S%H3915><s%>

And should not <S%H3808><s%> I <S%H589><s%> spare <S%H2347><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Nineveh, <S%H5210><s%> that great <S%H1419><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> are <S%H3426><s%> more <S%H7235><s%> than sixscore thousand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7239><s%> persons <S%H120><s%> that <S%H834><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> discern <S%H3045><s%> between <S%H996><s%> their right hand <S%H3225><s%> and their left hand; <S%H8040><s%> and also much <S%H7227><s%> cattle? <S%H929><s%>
